snippet.title: Qasir al-Wasat: International Edition - Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
Coming January 19 2016 to Steam, Humble Store and Nuuvem the International Edition of Qasir al-Wasat features stealth gameplay in a gorgeously crafted 12th century Syrian palace riddled with puzzles, traps and mysteries.

Fully localized in: Czech, French, German, Italian, Polish, Portuguese and Russian;
30+ Achievements;
Keyboard and gamepad fully supported.

More info at http://QasirGame.com

Music by Matt Lopes.

❤ 2012 2015 Aduge / Zueira Digital
